meanings.meaning: Measure a thousand times and cut once.

vlive.korean: 천 번 해도 다시 해야 돼 - 저 할리갈리 잘하지 않아요? You have to re-do the game 1000 times. - Am I not good at Halli Galli, though? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 연준 : 게임의 정석
vlive.english: You have to re-do the game 1000 times. - Am I not good at Halli Galli, though?

vlive.korean: 천 번 이상 불렀죠 - 진짜 많이 불렀으니까... Over a 1000 times. - Since we sang it so many times... 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full]SINGING ROOM X Lovelyz (코인노래방 X 러블리즈)
vlive.english: Over a 1000 times. - Since we sang it so many times...

vlive.korean: [천년 동안 꽃이 피고 지고 Photo by 선호] 와 이건 꽃이 천 번 피고 진 거겠네. Wow, this tree bloomed and fell a thousand times. 듣기 View video 포토피플(PHOTO PEOPLE) : 포토피플 in TOKYO 9부_ep.3 라이벌戰 정면승부가 시작된다!
vlive.english: Wow, this tree bloomed and fell a thousand times.

vlive.korean: 이거 역시 천 번 연습했어. practiced this like 1000 times. 듣기 View video YGK+ : 효니티비4 제주올래 Mukbang (Eating broadcast)
천번 듣고 한번 부르는게 낫다고 하셨어요. than singing a song thousand times. 듣기 View video LEE HI : HI TV - Episode 02
vlive.english: than singing a song thousand times.

examples.korean: Measure a thousand times and cut once. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 천번 재고, 단번에 베라. (터키속담, 노력속담) 명언/속담
examples.english: Measure a thousand times and cut once. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Quitting smoking is easy, Mark Twain once said,“ I’ve done it a thousand times.” 듣기 Add to Wordbook 마크 트웨인은 담배를 끊는 것이 쉽다면서“나는 천 번도 넘게 담배를 끊었다.”고 말했다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Quitting smoking is easy, Mark Twain once said,“ I’ve done it a thousand times.” Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Do you know the saying 'A picture is worth a thousand words'? Well, in this book, the saying has been changed to 'A picture is worth a thousand screams'! 듣기 Add to Wordbook 당신은 '한 장의 사진이 천 단어의 가치가 있다'는 속담을 아시나요? 이 책에서 이 속담은 '한 장의 사진이 천 번의 비명을 지르게 한다'로 바뀐다. Neungyule
examples.english: Do you know the saying 'A picture is worth a thousand words'? Well, in this book, the saying has been changed to 'A picture is worth a thousand screams'! Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The volcano has been bursting with activity since September 23, when thousands of little earthquakes hit. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 화산은 수 천번의 작은 지진이 있었던 9월 23일 이후로 활동을 시작하였다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The volcano has been bursting with activity since September 23, when thousands of little earthquakes hit. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: But Wikipedia’s current affairs articles, as well as older articles being edited, are updated thousands of times an hour. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 하지만 위키피디아의 시사적인 내용의 기사들과 더 오래된 기사들은 한 시간에도 수 천 번 수정되고 업데이트된다. EDU TIMES
examples.english: But Wikipedia’s current affairs articles, as well as older articles being edited, are updated thousands of times an hour. Add to Wordbook
